content: of round k knit round 7 k2tog k3 p1 *p4 p2tog* to end of round k2tog knit 2 together round 8 k3 k2tog *p3 p2tog* to end of round p purl round 9 *k2 k2tog* to end of round p2tog purl 2 together round 10 *k1 k2tog* to end of round st sts stitch stitches round 11 *k2tog* to end of round afer your last crown row 7 8 9 st remain finishing break yarn and draw through remaining stitches pulling tightly sew it to the inside of the hat securely weave in ends and block flat on a circular surface i am a knitwear designer living and loving buenos aires argentina i d love you to stay in touch you can find me in ravelry as jojilocat you can visit my ravelry shop join our ravelry group or follow me on facebook instagram or twitter www jojiknits blogspot com 2
